data_description.instance_type:
**Normal**: Konfigurer en enkelt panelorientering (f.eks. Øst, Syd, Vest)
**Kumulativ**: Aggreger prognoser fra flere orienteringer til en enkelt total prognose

normal.title: Konfigurer enkelt orientering
normal.description: Konfigurer solpaneler til en enkelt orientering. Du kan markere denne instans til at blive inkluderet i en kumulativ prognose.

data_description.modules_power: Total spidseffekt i watt for dine solpaneler
data_description.inverter_power: Kapaciteten af din inverter i watt (0 for ingen grænse)
data_description.damping_morning: Justerer resultater om morgenen (0.0 = ingen dæmpning, 1.0 = maks. dæmpning)
data_description.damping_evening: Justerer resultater om aftenen (0.0 = ingen dæmpning, 1.0 = maks. dæmpning)
data_description.include_in_cumulative: Aktivér for at inkludere denne orientering i kumulative prognoseberegninger
data_description.name: Navngiv denne instans efter orientering (f.eks. 'Øst Paneler', 'Syd Paneler', 'Vest Paneler')

cumulative.title: Konfigurer kumulativ prognose
cumulative.description: Denne instans vil aggregere prognoser fra alle orienteringer markeret til kumulering. Den giver kombinerede produktionsprognoser.

energy_production_d2.name: Estimated energy production - day after tomorrow

energy_production_d3.name: Estimated energy production - 3 days from now

energy_production_d4.name: Estimated energy production - 4 days from now

energy_production_d5.name: Estimated energy production - 5 days from now

energy_production_d6.name: Estimated energy production - 6 days from now

energy_production_d7.name: Estimated energy production - 7 days from now
